name: gShift
description: Save the world with Guster! gShift is a 2.5D puzzle-platformer with 99 maze levels across 10 types of terrain.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB Video Card Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Duo Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Graphics Card Storage: 400 MB available space
